mapper.select: select a.* , t1.dict_label as PublishBookLevelLinkText, t5.TeamName as TeamIDLinkText, t6.real_name as CreateUserIDLinkText, t7.dict_label as StatusLinkText from ACH_Thesis a left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type='期刊级别') t1 on a.PublishBookLevel = t1.dict_value left join PM_Team t5 on a.TeamID = t5.TeamID join sys_user t6 on a.CreateUserID = t6.user_id left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type='科技成果状态') t7 on a.Status = t7.dict_value where a.ThesisID = #{thesisid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ACH_Thesis (ThesisID, ThesisName, PublishBookName, PublishBookLevel, ThesisLevel, Year, Issue, Period, Page, Keyword, Memo, DOI, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status) values (#{thesisid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thesisname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishbookname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishbooklevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thesislevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ACH_Thesis set ThesisName = #{thesisname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PublishBookName = #{publishbookname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PublishBookLevel = #{publishbooklevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ThesisLevel = #{thesislevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Issue = #{issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Period = #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Page = #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOI = #{doi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TeamID = #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateUserID = #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ThesisID = #{thesisid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ThesisID, ThesisName, PublishBookName, PublishBookLevel, ThesisLevel, Year, Issue, Period, Page, Keyword, Memo, DOI, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status from ACH_Thesis where ThesisID = #{thesisid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ThesisID, ThesisName, PublishBookName, PublishBookLevel, ThesisLevel, Year, Issue, Period, Page, Keyword, Memo, DOI, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status from ACH_Thesis
